result.reason: Currently, minimizing a full-screen RDP session triggers OnLeaveFullScreenMode which forcibly restores the main window to Normal state ('docking to tab'). Users want an option to keep it minimized.
result.approach: Add a new setting 'DoNotRestoreOnRdpMinimize' to OptionsTabsPanelsPage. In RdpProtocol.RDPEvent_OnLeaveFullscreenMode, check this setting before restoring WindowState to Normal.
